Title: Draught
Main effect: Stoneskin. Gives resistance to martial damage.
Side effect: Swelling.
Container: A metal thermos.
The label is: Its description in infernal.
The liquid is: Pink with some type of gore from a slain creature.
Taste: Blood.
Smell: Sulphur.
Texture: Slimey.
Potency: Supreme -- 10d4 + 20.
Quality: Simple -- 6d4 + 6.
Duration: 10 minutes.

Title: Concoction
Main effect: Wild magic. Taps into wild magic making an absolutely random thing happen.
Side effect: Uncontrollable babbling.
Container: An ornate very decorated glass bottle.
The label is: A heartfelt hate letter for someone.
The liquid is: Dark Red with some type of gore from a slain creature.
Taste: Rain.
Smell: Minty.
Texture: Almost gaseous.
Potency: Mighty -- 6d4 + 6.
Quality: Refined -- 4d4 + 4.
Duration: 5 minutes.

Title: Vial

The liquid is: Light Blue with a cloudy murkiness.
Taste: Rotting meat.
Smell: Home.
Texture: Almost solid.
Potency: Lesser -- 1d4 + 1.
Quality: Perfect.
Duration: 1 minute.

Smell: Flowers.
Texture: Milky.
Potency: Greater -- 4d4 + 4.
Quality: Crude -- 8d4 + 8.
Duration: 10 minutes.

Side effect: The irresistible urge to dance.
Container: A coloured bottle.
The label is: Its description in orcish.
The liquid is: Gold with chunks of metal in it.
Taste: A forge.
Smell: Rotting meat.
Texture: Airy and bubbly.
Potency: Superior -- 8d4 + 8.
Quality: Simple -- 6d4 + 6.
Duration: 5 hours.

Title: Philter
Main effect: Owls Wake. Makes the user need no sleep for a time.
Side effect: Increased confidence.
Container: An inhaler like spray bottle.
The label is: That plays a very quiet sing song till the bottle is empty.
The liquid is: Clear with stripes of colour.
Taste: The end of the world.
Smell: Cheap perfume.
Texture: Milky.
Potency: Superior -- 8d4 + 8.
Quality: Simple -- 6d4 + 6.
Duration: 5 hours.

Title: Potion
Main effect: Bless Weapon. Makes the users weapons do more damage.
Perfect potions do not have side effects!
Container: A metal thermos.
The label is: A label showing how many calories it is.
The liquid is: Light grey with chunks of metal in it.
Taste: Gold.
Smell: Garlic.
Texture: Thin and watery.
Potency: Lesser -- 1d4 + 1.
Quality: Perfect.
Duration: 10 minutes.

Title: Tonic
Main effect: Fame. Makes the user more famous.
Perfect potions do not have side effects!
Container: An inhaler like spray bottle.
The label is: A list of ingredients in their chemical forms.
The liquid is: Pale Green with a constant heat.
Taste: A storm.
Smell: Aromatic spices.
Texture: Almost gaseous.
Potency: Supreme -- 10d4 + 20.
Quality: Perfect.
Duration: 30 minutes.

Taste: Leather.
Smell: A fresh baby.
Texture: Almost gaseous.

Quality: Pure -- 2d4 + 2.
Duration: 5 minutes.

Quality: Pure -- 2d4 + 2.
Duration: 30 minutes.

Title: Ichor
Main effect: Hook Horror. The users hands become sharp weaponised blades.
Perfect potions do not have side effects!
Container: A small shot sized bottle.
The label is: Gnomish diagrams for its use.
The liquid is: Orange with fizzing bubbles.
Taste: Chocolate.
Smell: Beef.
Texture: Milky.
Potency: Mighty -- 6d4 + 6.
Quality: Perfect.
Duration: 5 minutes.

Title: Elixir
Main effect: Split Form. The user turns into two or three tiny versions of themselves and controls them all.
Side effect: Increased confidence.
Container: A metal thermos.
The label is: A few unrelated letters.
The liquid is: Pink with swirls of colour.
Taste: Fruit punch.
Smell: Acidic.
Texture: Thick and sludgy.
Potency: Common -- 2d4 + 2.
Quality: Crude -- 8d4 + 8.
Duration: 1 minute.

Title: Philter
Main effect: Health. Cures all diseases and illnesses.
Side effect: A fever.
Container: A geometric diamond shaped bottle.
The label is: A mass produced label claiming the company has no fault for any side effects.
The liquid is: Blue with two separated liquid phases.
Taste: Massage oil.
Smell: Human Flesh.
Texture: Milky.
Potency: Greater -- 4d4 + 4.
Quality: Exquisite -- 1d4 + 1.
Duration: 1 hour.

Title: Juice
Main effect: Giant Strength. It gives the user much more strength.
Side effect: Sneezing.
Container: A small metal vial.
The label is: A heartfelt love letter for someone.
The liquid is: Gold with dirt floating in it.
Taste: Rotten eggs.
Smell: Gingerbread.
Texture: Thick and sludgy.
Potency: Superior -- 8d4 + 8.
Quality: Pure -- 2d4 + 2.
Duration: 1 hour.

Container: A not quite watertight leather waterskin.
The label is: Ornate and beautiful designs.
The liquid is: Metallic with dirt floating in it.
Taste: Fish.
Smell: Vanilla.
Texture: Thin and watery.
Potency: Greater -- 4d4 + 4.
Quality: Perfect.
Duration: 10 minutes.

Perfect potions do not have side effects!
Container: A stone flask.
The label is: A healing symbol.
The liquid is: Orange with steam coming from it.
Taste: Massage oil.
Smell: Sulphur.
Texture: Bitty.
Potency: Supreme -- 10d4 + 20.
Quality: Perfect.
Duration: 1 hour.

Title: Brew
Main effect: Mana. Gives the user more magical power to cast with.
Side effect: Strong believe you’re someone else.
Container: A small metal vial.
The label is: A map of where the potion was made.
The liquid is: Light grey with translucency.
Taste: Old fruit.
Smell: Mud.
Texture: Bitty.
Potency: Mighty -- 6d4 + 6.
Quality: Refined -- 4d4 + 4.
Duration: 1 minute.

Title: Tonic
Main effect: Stoneskin. Gives resistance to martial damage.
Side effect: Puts the user to sleep.
Container: A small shot sized bottle.
The label is: Saying that it shouldn’t be drank by anyone under 18.
The liquid is: Light Blue with chunks of metal in it.
Taste: Musk.
Smell: Vomit.
Texture: Thin and watery.
Potency: Common -- 2d4 + 2.
Quality: Exquisite -- 1d4 + 1.
Duration: 30 minutes.

Container: A square glass bottle.
The label is: Its description in draconic.
The liquid is: Orange with blood within it.
Taste: Flowers.
Smell: Nothing at all.
Texture: Oily.
Potency: Supreme -- 10d4 + 20.
Quality: Refined -- 4d4 + 4.
Duration: 30 minutes.

Title: Tonic

Perfect potions do not have side effects!
Container: A square glass bottle.
The label is: A warning of an ancient curse.
The liquid is: Pale Green with a face in the liquid.
Taste: Holy oils.
Smell: A colour.
Texture: Almost solid.
Potency: Lesser -- 1d4 + 1.
Quality: Perfect.
Duration: 5 hours.

Title: Concoction
Main effect: Riddle me gone. Gives the user the cure to a single riddle.
Side effect: A sudden horrific accent.
Container: An inhaler like spray bottle.
The label is: All in some kind of raised symbols for the blind to read.
The liquid is: Purple with a face in the liquid.
Taste: The sea.
Smell: Cheese.
Texture: Chunky.
Potency: Common -- 2d4 + 2.
Quality: Exquisite -- 1d4 + 1.
Duration: 30 minutes.

Texture: Almost gaseous.

Quality: Exquisite -- 1d4 + 1.
Duration: 10 minutes.

Side effect: Fidgeting.
Container: A metal thermos.
The label is: All in some kind of raised symbols for the blind to read.
The liquid is: Yellow with a cloudy murkiness.
Taste: The sewers.
Smell: Fresh water.
Texture: Bitty.
Potency: Superior -- 8d4 + 8.
Quality: Exquisite -- 1d4 + 1.
Duration: 1 hour.

Title: Vial
Main effect: Invulnerability. Freezes the user in stasis that makes them immune to damage but they cannot move or act.
Side effect: The hearing of demons.
Container: An inhaler like spray bottle.
The label is: Doesn’t seem to have one.
The liquid is: Orange with a bright glow.
Taste: A colour.
Smell: Mayonnaise.
Texture: Airy and bubbly.
Potency: Superior -- 8d4 + 8.
Quality: Exquisite -- 1d4 + 1.
Duration: 1 hour.

Title: Philter
Main effect: Gods Touch. Gives the user a holy connection to their god or fiendish deity.
Perfect potions do not have side effects!
Container: A large bottle that can be swigged several times.
The label is: The name of the bad guy.
The liquid is: Red with constantly moving and shifting liquid.
Taste: Beef.
Smell: Chocolate.
Texture: Milky.
Potency: Lesser -- 1d4 + 1.
Quality: Perfect.
Duration: 10 minutes.

Title: Draught
Main effect: Fleet foot. Makes the user have more speed.
Side effect: Baldness.

The label is: A note saying the alchemist thinks it is its greatest work.
The liquid is: Gold with stripes of colour.
Taste: Sand.
Smell: Gingerbread.
Texture: Thick and sludgy.
Potency: Lesser -- 1d4 + 1.
Quality: Exquisite -- 1d4 + 1.
Duration: 1 minute.

Container: A metal thermos.
The label is: Its name and flavour.
The liquid is: Gold with flecks of colour.
Taste: Of chemicals.
Smell: The end of the world.
Texture: Chunky.
Potency: Superior -- 8d4 + 8.
Quality: Perfect.
Duration: 1 hour.

Side effect: Fear of something.
Container: A not quite watertight leather waterskin.
The label is: A label showing how many calories it is.
The liquid is: Light Blue with chunks of metal in it.
Taste: Gingerbread.
Smell: The sea.
Texture: Chunky.
Potency: Greater -- 4d4 + 4.
Quality: Refined -- 4d4 + 4.
Duration: 5 hours.

Title: Potion
Main effect: Feast. Removes all hunger and thirst from the target.
Side effect: Uncontrollable crying.
Container: A glass syringe.
The label is: Very tiny print describing how the potion was made in great detail, around 1000 words.
The liquid is: Gold with a cloudy murkiness.
Taste: Success.
Smell: Nothing at all.
Texture: Thick and sludgy.
Potency: Mighty -- 6d4 + 6.
Quality: Crude -- 8d4 + 8.
Duration: 10 minutes.

Title: Elixir
Main effect: Riddle me gone. Gives the user the cure to a single riddle.
Side effect: Painful lust.
Container: A bone flask.
The label is: The name of the bad guy.
The liquid is: White with some kind of bone floating in it.
Taste: A damp cave.
Smell: The end of the world.
Texture: Almost gaseous.
Potency: Greater -- 4d4 + 4.
Quality: Pure -- 2d4 + 2.
Duration: 5 hours.

Title: Concoction
Main effect: Succubus Charm. Makes the drinker irresistible to nearby people.

The label is: Its description in Celestial.
The liquid is: Orange with swirls of colour.
Taste: Sugar.
Smell: Bark.
Texture: Thin and watery.
Potency: Greater -- 4d4 + 4.
Quality: Exquisite -- 1d4 + 1.
Duration: 5 hours.

Title: Brew

Texture: Chunky.
Potency: Mighty -- 6d4 + 6.
Quality: Refined -- 4d4 + 4.
Duration: 5 minutes.

Quality: Simple -- 6d4 + 6.
Duration: 5 hours.

The label is: A list of ingredients in their chemical forms.
The liquid is: Orange with bubbles suspended in it.
Taste: Festive.
Smell: The sea.
Texture: Bitty.
Potency: Superior -- 8d4 + 8.
Quality: Perfect.
Duration: 5 minutes.

Title: Concoction
Main effect: Serpent Tongue. Makes the user only able to lie.
Side effect: A sudden horrific accent.
Container: A geometric diamond shaped bottle.
The label is: All in some kind of raised symbols for the blind to read.

Smell: Orc.
Texture: Chunky.

Quality: Refined -- 4d4 + 4.

Quality: Perfect.

Side effect: Sudden Moustache.
Container: A translucent beer bottle.
The label is: An angry face.
The liquid is: Orange with translucency.
Taste: Wet dog.
Smell: Nothing at all.
Texture: Chunky.
Potency: Lesser -- 1d4 + 1.
Quality: Simple -- 6d4 + 6.
Duration: 1 hour.

Title: Concoction
Main effect: Midas. Makes the user turn things to gold.
Side effect: A fever.
Container: A small shot sized bottle.
The label is: A note saying that it never should have been made and copius blood stains over the bottle.
The liquid is: Clear with dirt floating in it.
Taste: Strange.
Smell: The Forest.
Texture: Thin and watery.
Potency: Common -- 2d4 + 2.
Quality: Simple -- 6d4 + 6.
Duration: 30 minutes.

Title: Potion
Main effect: Might. It gives a bonus to attack rolls after drinking.
Perfect potions do not have side effects!
Container: A stone flask.
The label is: A heartfelt hate letter for someone.
The liquid is: Pale Green with a bright glow.
Taste: Nothing at all.
Smell: Fresh Cake.
Texture: Almost gaseous.
Potency: Lesser -- 1d4 + 1.
Quality: Perfect.
Duration: 5 minutes.

Title: Concoction

Side effect: Vomiting.
Container: A capped horn.
The label is: A note saying DO NOT DRINK.
The liquid is: Red with fizzing bubbles.
Taste: Death.
Smell: The Forest.
Texture: Almost solid.
Potency: Greater -- 4d4 + 4.
Quality: Exquisite -- 1d4 + 1.
Duration: 10 minutes.

Title: Brew
Main effect: Goats Trek. Makes the user immune to the toils of long travels and bad weather.
Side effect: Coughing.
Container: A translucent beer bottle.
The label is: A map of where the potion was made.
The liquid is: Metallic with swirls of colour.
Taste: Human Flesh.
Smell: Old fruit.
Texture: Milky.
Potency: Common -- 2d4 + 2.
Quality: Refined -- 4d4 + 4.
Duration: 5 minutes.

Title: Ichor
Main effect: Utter Hatred. Makes the user have bonuses against a particular type of enemy.
Side effect: Tripping the hell out.
Container: A small metal vial.
The label is: A cartoony mascot.
The liquid is: Blue with some kind of bone floating in it.
Taste: Holy oils.
Smell: Minty.
Texture: Bitty.
Potency: Greater -- 4d4 + 4.
Quality: Refined -- 4d4 + 4.
Duration: 5 hours.

Title: Ichor
Main effect: Animal form. Makes the user turn into a random animal.
Side effect: Swelling.

The label is: Has faded beyond reading.
The liquid is: Black with some type of gore from a slain creature.
Taste: Salt.
Smell: Strange.
Texture: Bitty.
Potency: Supreme -- 10d4 + 20.
Quality: Crude -- 8d4 + 8.
Duration: 1 minute.

Title: Philter
Main effect: Poison. Poisons the user, weakening them.
Perfect potions do not have side effects!
Container: An ornate very decorated glass bottle.
The label is: Its description in infernal.
The liquid is: White with dirt floating in it.
Taste: Fruit.
Smell: Magically the worst thing to you
Texture: Oily.
Potency: Common -- 2d4 + 2.
Quality: Perfect.
Duration: 10 minutes.

Title: Elixir
Main effect: Godly form. Improves all stats.
Perfect potions do not have side effects!
Container: A geometric diamond shaped bottle.
The label is: A passive aggressive note about other people drinking potions that don’t belong to them.
The liquid is: Purple with steam coming from it.
Taste: Leather.
Smell: Blood.
Texture: Thick and sludgy.
Potency: Lesser -- 1d4 + 1.
Quality: Perfect.
Duration: 1 hour.

Title: Philter
Main effect: Cold Resistance. It gives resistance to cold damage.
Side effect: Sudden Moustache.
Container: A translucent long wine bottle.
The label is: A title describing the exact opposite.
The liquid is: Orange with translucency.
Taste: Cheap perfume.
Smell: Musk.
Texture: Almost solid.
Potency: Mighty -- 6d4 + 6.
Quality: Exquisite -- 1d4 + 1.
Duration: 1 minute.

Title: Brew
Main effect: Youth. Makes the user grow some years younger.
Perfect potions do not have side effects!
Container: A small medical vial.
The label is: Saying its designed for babies.
The liquid is: Bronze with fizzing bubbles.
Taste: Lilac and Gooseberries.
Smell: Home.
Texture: Slimey.
Potency: Lesser -- 1d4 + 1.
Quality: Perfect.
Duration: 1 minute.
